title: FS: Piedmont 42 Doc White(SOLD) and Mickey Doolan
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: FS: Piedmont 42 Doc White(SOLD) and Mickey Doolan
posts.post_content: For Sale are (1) T206 Piedmont 42's. Trying to help fund the purchase of another 42. I have a  Mickey Doolan Batting in PSA 3.5. Looking for $950 on the Doolan. Offers are certainly welcome. PM's take priority in order received.
